fulltext:
CURRICULUM VITAE 
Work Experience 
(Experience for 6 years of hard working in Frontend Developer at Japan and Singapore companies) 
Accor Hotels – Senior Frontend Developer (12/2017 – Now) 
** Works : 
- Building web components with ReactJs, hybrid-app by using Ionic framework 
- Create webpage template components ( PUG / SCSS / JS )   
- Maintenance current wordpress sites with booking engine  
- Working on the projects from Europe , focusing mainly on UI / UX 
- Manage team 3 members. 
Splash Interactive Vietnam – Senior Frontend Developer (12/2015 – 12/2017) 
** Works : 
- Building webpage & Application : Pug / Sass / Grunt / Gulp 
- Optimizing product for highest quality. 
- Support UI / UX Design team 
- Experiences with CMS (Sitefinity , Sitecore , Wordpress , Umbraco ) 
- Interface with Product Manager , developers to determine optimal specifications  
Primelabo VietNam – Frontend Developer  (11/2012 – 11/2015) 
** Works : 
- Create web animation ( Banner / Advertisment / minigame ) : HTML5 / CSS3 / Javascript 
- Building webpage & Application follow specification from Japan 
- Convert design on AI / PSD to HTML webpage with pixel perfect  
- Maintenance old projects, Intergrate static webpage to CMS with PHP Smarty. 
- Working with Wordpress  
** Strengths Personality 
- Always meet the deadline. 
- Ability to work both independently and teamwork. 
- Listen carefully before acting. 
- Responsible for assigned work. 
- Good mindset and memory. 
- Open mind and be willing to learning new things.  
PHẠM HOÀNG HUY 
DOB   : July 03, 1989 
Tel      : 0906 989653 
Email  : huyhoang.ph89@gmail.com 
Addr   : Hiep Phu ward , District 9 
About Me 
Experience for over 6 years of hard working in 
Frontend Developer. I have sence of 
responsibility, carefulness in all the works done 
are my greatest strengths. Furthermore, I’m 
enthusiastic, dynamic, open-minded, creative 
thinking, willing to learn, stand the test in work 
and explore new fields 
SKILL 
-- Work -- 
1. HTML5 / CSS3 / Animation 
2. Javascript / Jquery / Ajax  
3. Jade / Pug / Scss / Less 
4. Grunt / Gulp / React  
5. Source Control (GIT/SVN)  
6. CMS (Wordpress , Umbraco , Sitecore…) 
-- Personal -- 
1. English , Japanese 
2. Communication , Organization  
-- Education -- 
1. HCM University of technology 
Major: Information tecnology  
2. Dong Du Japanese School : N3 
3. IIG : 600 points of Toeic Certificate  
HCMC, VietNam
